short_summary: The Department of National Defense Valcartier is seeking competitive bids for the acquisition of a Floor Scrubber...
description: The procurement is for a Floor Scrubber including delivery located in Courcelette, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Floor Scrubber Acquisition for DND Valcartier

## Important Details

*   Publication Date: December 22, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST (Non-responsive bids will be declared after this time)
*   Amendment Date: January 23, 2023
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Procurement Details

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services
*   End-User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND) Valcartier
*   Location: Courcelette, Quebec, Canada
*   Goods and Services Code: 25101919 (Road sweeper)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Trade Agreements: None
*   Regions of Opportunity: None

## Contract Details

*   Request for Proposal Number: W0106-22J019
*   Solicitation Number: WS3779415649
*   Reference Number: WS3779415649-Doc3782540220

## Contact Information

*   Pierre-Luc Dube (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [pierre-luc.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pierre-luc.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Company: Department of Public Works and Government Services
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

## Notice URL

*   [Discovery Website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14961718?extsite=MTQ5NjE3MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (English)
*   [Notice URL (French)](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14961718?extsite=MTQ5NjE3MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued this request for proposal on behalf of the Department of National Defense Valcartier. The proposal is for the acquisition of a Floor Scrubber, including delivery, as detailed in Annex A. All bids must be submitted by January 25, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST to
